title: Edward Hopper Nighthawks Glass Wire Weight
description:
Wire Weight developed from Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks 1943 from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Our unique glass paperweight is both decorative and functional.  It will not only keep papers tidy and secure, but will also secure your desk wires in place with a curved groove in the bottom of the paperweight.  The glass wire weight is cut, beveled, assembled and polished all by hand.  Comes in a satin lined gift box. 

  • Dimensions: 2.3125 x 2.3125 x .75 in.
  • Materials: Glass
  • Weight: Approximately 5.5 oz.
